tool_description: Get a list of the most expensive and bestselling NFTs ever sold.

api_list.name: Monthly volume by gallery
api_list.description: Retrieve the monthly volume of NFT sales categorized by gallery.

api_list.name: Latest sold
api_list.description: Get a list of recently sold artworks. Possible filtering by gallery includes Art Blocks, Async Art, Auction Houses, Foundation, hic et nunc, KnownOrigin, MakersPlace, Nifty Gateway, and SuperRare.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specify the page number for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort the results by the date sold.

api_list.name: Most expensive
api_list.description: Get a list of the most expensive artworks sold. Possible filtering by gallery includes Art Blocks, Async Art, Auction Houses, Foundation, hic et nunc, KnownOrigin, MakersPlace, Nifty Gateway, and SuperRare.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort the results by price in USD.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specify the page number for pagination.
